item.title: Gilead’s Experimental One Pill Regimen Proved Non-Inferior To Multi-Pill Regimens In Treating HIV
item.description: The company now plans to submit the data from the study to regulatory authorities.

item.title: Cannabis Stocks Drop As Shutdown Deal Tightens Hemp-THC Rules
item.description: The U.S. government funding bill to end the shutdown included language tightening rules on hemp-derived THC products.

item.title: Pfizer CEO Sees Metsera’s Drugs Hit Market As Early As 2028 After Completing Acquisition: Report
item.description: CEO Albert Bourla told Yahoo Finance that the acquisition of GLP-1 maker Metsera is part of the company's "right to win" in the obesity drug game.

item.title: Why Did Bloom Energy Stock Decline 18% On Thursday?
item.description: Bloom Energy has been selected as one of the underlying companies for Tradr ETFs’ latest suite of single-stock leveraged ETFs.

item.title: Why Did BTDR Stock Decline 18% Today?
item.description: Bitdeer announced pricing of $400 million convertible notes, carrying an annual interest rate of 4%.
